data.comment: The match has started, with Sheffield Wed kicking-off.
Sheffield Wed's Elias Kachunga has been booked in Sheffield.
In the minute 33, Jefferson Lerma (Bournemouth) has received a first yellow card.
Joey Pelupessy is booked for the home team.
At Hillsborough Stadium, Liam Palmer has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Sheffield.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Bournemouth kick-off.
Julian Borner for Sheffield Wed has been booked by Jeremy Simpson and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 67, Bournemouth make their first substitution with Dominic Solanke replacing David Brooks.
Sheffield Wed have been awarded a penalty...
Steve Cook (Bournemouth) has been sent off!
In the minute 71, Barry Bannan converts the penalty to give Sheffield Wed a 1-0 lead.
Lewis Cook is on a sub for Arnaut Danjuma for Bournemouth.
The home team have replaced Elias Kachunga with Callum Paterson. This is the first substitution made today by Garry Monk.
In the minute 80, Jack Stacey is replacing Diego Rico Salguero for Bournemouth at Hillsborough Stadium.
Garry Monk is making the team's second substitution at Hillsborough Stadium with Isaiah Brown replacing Adam Reach.
Jack Marriott is replacing Josh Windass for the home team.
That's full-time at Hillsborough Stadium. The final score is 1-0.
Kadeem Harris (Sheffield Wed) has received a yellow card from Jeremy Simpson.
Kadeem Harris (Sheffield Wed) is red-carded and dismissed.
